title: How to Make the Simplest Lettuce Salad

steps.headline: Wash lettuce.
steps.description: Separate lettuce from the cluster. If the lettuce is from the garden, then you will need to soak it in salt water or use a drop of bleach to make sure it is properly clean.

steps.headline: Cut lettuce.
steps.description: Cut the lettuce in whatever size you want, but preferable large cuts on a tray or bowl.

steps.headline: Squeeze the lemons.
steps.description: If you are using lemon, then squeeze the lemons into a cup. If you are using vinegar, then pour a reasonable amount into a cup.

steps.headline: Add sugar to the vinegar or lemon.
steps.description: The amount of sugar should be enough to have a thick syrup-like consistency. Mix it very well that the sugar crystals are not visible.

steps.headline: Put a small amount of cooking oil into the "syrup".
Use a spoon to spread the lemon/vinegar syrup on the cut salad.
Slice the tomatoes and onions and add them to your salad.

text: Wash lettuce. Separate lettuce from the cluster. If the lettuce is from the garden, then you will need to soak it in salt water or use a drop of bleach to make sure it is properly clean. Cut lettuce. Cut the lettuce in whatever size you want, but preferable large cuts on a tray or bowl. Put the cut lettuce aside.  Squeeze the lemons. If you are using lemon, then squeeze the lemons into a cup. If you are using vinegar, then pour a reasonable amount into a cup. Add sugar to the vinegar or lemon. The amount of sugar should be enough to have a thick syrup-like consistency. Mix it very well that the sugar crystals are not visible. Put a small amount of cooking oil into the "syrup". Mix well. Use a spoon to spread the lemon/vinegar syrup on the cut salad. Mix lightly. Slice the tomatoes and onions and add them to your salad. This is optional.
